uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Universally unique identifier (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier) of an entity in the world

data.title: Entity Data
data.description: SNBT-formatted string (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/NBT_format#SNBT_format) containing entity data (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Entity_format#Entity_Format) information that should be changed
